alert.note: Alert for Attala; Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 13 at 7:22PM CDT until April 13 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LEAKE AND SOUTHEASTERN ATTALA COUNTIES... At 722 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Singleton, or 9 miles north of Carthage, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Singleton around 725 PM CDT. Renfroe around 730 PM CDT. Smyrna around 735 PM CDT. Zama around 740 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Redwater. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
